topics.title: Describe a peaceful scene
topics.prompt: Describe a peaceful scene you have experienced or imagine one.
topics.hint: 描述你曾經經歷過的或想像中的一個平靜場景。說幾句話，包含場景細節和感受。
topics.sample: I remember sitting by a calm river in the afternoon. The water was smooth, and the sun was shining softly. It made me feel relaxed and happy.

topics.title: Talk about a favorite childhood game
topics.prompt: Talk about a game you liked to play as a child and explain why you enjoyed it.
topics.hint: 談談你童年時喜歡玩的遊戲，說明原因。可提及遊戲規則、玩伴、感受。
topics.sample: When I was a child, I loved playing hide and seek with my friends. It was exciting to find good hiding places and try not to get caught.

topics.title: Explain the meaning of 'life is but a dream'
topics.prompt: Explain what you think the phrase 'life is but a dream' means.
topics.hint: 試著用自己的話解釋這句話的意思。可談人生、夢想或感覺。
topics.sample: I think the phrase means that life is like a dream because it can be beautiful and short. We should enjoy every moment we have.

topics.title: Describe a calm or gentle movement
topics.prompt: Describe a calm or gentle movement you have seen or experienced.
topics.hint: 描述一個你看過或感受到的平穩或溫柔的動作。說出動作和感受。
topics.sample: I once watched leaves slowly falling from a tree. The leaves moved gently in the wind, and it was very soothing to watch.

topics.title: Share a happy memory
topics.prompt: Share a happy memory and explain what made it special.
topics.hint: 分享一個讓你開心的回憶，並說明原因。可以包含時間、地點和人物。
topics.sample: One happy memory is when my family went to the beach last summer. We played games and ate ice cream. It was a very fun day.

topics.title: Imagine rowing a boat gently
topics.prompt: Imagine you are rowing a boat gently down a river. Describe what you see and feel.
topics.hint: 想像你輕輕划船過河，描述看到的景象和感覺。盡量用細節。
topics.sample: I am rowing a small boat on a quiet river. The water is smooth and the birds are singing. I feel calm and happy.

topics.title: Talk about the importance of being merry
topics.prompt: Talk about why it is important to be merry or happy in life.
topics.hint: 談談為什麼保持快樂對生活很重要。可以提及自己或其他人的經驗。
topics.sample: Being merry helps me feel positive and enjoy life more. When I am happy, I can solve problems easily and make friends.

topics.title: Describe your favorite outdoor activity
topics.prompt: Describe your favorite outdoor activity and why you like it.
topics.hint: 描述喜歡的戶外活動，說明為什麼喜歡。可以講地點、活動內容和感覺。
topics.sample: I love riding my bicycle in the park. It is fun and healthy. I like feeling the fresh air and seeing the green trees.

topics.title: Tell a short story inspired by the song
topics.prompt: Create a short story inspired by the idea of gently rowing a boat.
topics.hint: 根據輕輕划船的想法，講一個短故事。可以是想像的情節。
topics.sample: A little girl found a small boat by the lake. She gently rowed it to the middle and saw beautiful fish swimming below. She felt happy and peaceful.

topics.title: Discuss how music can make you feel happy
topics.prompt: Discuss how music can change your mood and make you feel merry.
topics.hint: 討論音樂如何影響情緒，使你感到快樂。可以分享自己的例子。
topics.sample: When I listen to happy music, I feel cheerful and energetic. Music can change my mood and help me relax after a long day.
